testsuite.name: com.poc.apistyles.arch.CodingRulesTest

testcase.name: noPublicFields()

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: Architecture Violation [Priority: MEDIUM] - Rule 'no fields should be public, because Classes should encapsulate their fields. Use getters/setters instead.' was violated (9 times): Field <com.poc.apistyles.domain.model.CustomerTier.BRONZE> has modifier PUBLIC in (CustomerTier.java:0) Field <com.poc.apistyles.domain.model.CustomerTier.GOLD> has modifier PUBLIC in (CustomerTier.java:0) Field <com.poc.apistyles.domain.model.CustomerTier.PLATINUM> has modifier PUBLIC in (CustomerTier.java:0) Field <com.poc.apistyles.domain.model.CustomerTier.SILVER> has modifier PUBLIC in (CustomerTier.java:0) Field <com.poc.apistyles.domain.model.OrderStatus.CANCELLED> has modifier PUBLIC in (OrderStatus.java:0) Field <com.poc.apistyles.domain.model.OrderStatus.CONFIRMED> has modifier PUBLIC in (OrderStatus.java:0) Field <com.poc.apistyles.domain.model.OrderStatus.CREATED> has modifier PUBLIC in (OrderStatus.java:0) Field <com.poc.apistyles.domain.model.OrderStatus.DELIVERED> has modifier PUBLIC in (OrderStatus.java:0) Field <com.poc.apistyles.domain.model.OrderStatus.SHIPPED> has modifier PUBLIC in (OrderStatus.java:0)

testcase.name: noFieldInjectionWithAutowired()

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: Architecture Violation [Priority: MEDIUM] - Rule 'no fields should be annotated with @Autowired, because Field injection is not recommended. Use constructor injection instead.' was violated (5 times): Field <com.poc.apistyles.adapter.soap.endpoint.CustomerSoapEndpoint.customerService> is annotated with @Autowired in (CustomerSoapEndpoint.java:0) Field <com.poc.apistyles.adapter.soap.endpoint.OrderSoapEndpoint.orderService> is annotated with @Autowired in (OrderSoapEndpoint.java:0) Field <com.poc.apistyles.adapter.websocket.handler.OrderStatusHandler.notificationService> is annotated with @Autowired in (OrderStatusHandler.java:0) Field <com.poc.apistyles.adapter.websocket.service.NotificationService.messagingTemplate> is annotated with @Autowired in (NotificationService.java:0) Field <com.poc.apistyles.adapter.websocket.service.NotificationService.orderService> is annotated with @Autowired in (NotificationService.java:0)
